Package se.idsec.signservice.security.sign

Interface Signer<T,​R extends SignerResult<T>,​P extends SignerParameters>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type for the document that is signed
    R - the type of signing result
    P - the type of signer parameters
    public interface Signer<T,​R extends SignerResult<T>,​P extends SignerParameters>
    Interface that represents a signer, i.e. an instance that given a set of signature properties signs documents.
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      se.swedenconnect.security.credential.PkiCredential getSigningCredential()
      Gets the signing credential that is used for the signing operation.
      R sign​(T document)
      Signs the document using the installed signing credential (getSigningCredential()).
      R sign​(T document, P parameters)
      Signs the document using the installed signing credential (getSigningCredential()) and the supplied signer parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        R sign​(T document)
throws SignatureException
        Signs the document using the installed signing credential (getSigningCredential()).

        Corresponds to invoking sign(Object, SignerParameters) with the parameters set to null.

        Parameters:
        document - the document to sign
        Returns:
        a signature result (including the signed document)
        Throws:
        SignatureException - for signature errors
        See Also:
        sign(Object, SignerParameters)

      • sign

        R sign​(T document,
       P parameters)
throws SignatureException
        Signs the document using the installed signing credential (getSigningCredential()) and the supplied signer parameters.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to sign
        parameters - optional signer parameters
        Returns:
        a signature result (including the signed document)
        Throws:
        SignatureException - for signature errors
        See Also:
        sign(Object)

      • getSigningCredential

        se.swedenconnect.security.credential.PkiCredential getSigningCredential()
        Gets the signing credential that is used for the signing operation.
        Returns:
        the signing credential
